title: Achieve Your Transformation | Garrett Hawkins
description: Today we are celebrating our first episode of Beauty Uncovered in 2022. Let's talk about our resolutions. Did you know that, in multiple surveys, the number one New Year's resolution is to get fit? Today's guest is Garrett Hawkins, a personal trainer, and a transformation specialist. He's going to share some straightforward advice on how you can stick to that promise to yourself and achieve your very own transformation.
